verses.verse: Masters, <S%G2962><s%> give <S%G3930><s%> unto your servants <S%G1401><s%> that which is just <S%G1342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> equal; <S%G2471><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> a Master <S%G2962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
Continue <S%G4342><s%> in prayer, <S%G4335><s%> and watch <S%G1127><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> thanksgiving; <S%G2169><s%>

Withal <S%G260><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> would open <S%G455><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> a door <S%G2374><s%> of utterance, <S%G3056><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I am also in bonds: <S%G1210><s%> <S%G2532><s%>
That <S%G2443><s%> I may make it manifest, <S%G5319><s%> <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to speak. <S%G2980><s%>
Walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> them that are without, <S%G1854><s%> redeeming <S%G1805><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time. <S%G2540><s%>

Let your <S%G5216><s%> speech <S%G3056><s%> be always <S%G3842><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> grace, <S%G5485><s%> seasoned <S%G741><s%> with salt, <S%G217><s%> that ye may know <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to answer <S%G611><s%> every man. <S%G1520><s%> <S%G1538><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> my state <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1691><s%> shall Tychicus <S%G5190><s%> declare <S%G1107><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> who is a beloved <S%G27><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a faithful <S%G4103><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fellow servant <S%G4889><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I have sent <S%G3992><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the same purpose, <S%G846><s%> <S%G5124><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might know <S%G1097><s%> your estate, <S%G4012><s%> <S%G5216><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> comfort <S%G3870><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts; <S%G2588><s%>

With <S%G4862><s%> Onesimus, <S%G3682><s%> a faithful <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%> They shall make known <S%G1107><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> which are done here. <S%G5602><s%>

Aristarchus <S%G708><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow prisoner <S%G4869><s%> saluteth <S%G782><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Mark, <S%G3138><s%> sister's son <S%G431><s%> to Barnabas, <S%G921><s%> (touching <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> ye received <S%G2983><s%> commandments: <S%G1785><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> him;) <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> which is called <S%G3004><s%> Justus, <S%G2459><s%> who are <S%G5607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the circumcision. <S%G4061><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> are my fellow workers <S%G4904><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> have been <S%G1096><s%> a comfort <S%G3931><s%> unto me. <S%G3427><s%>

Epaphras, <S%G1889><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is one of <S%G1537><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> saluteth <S%G782><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> laboring fervently <S%G75><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prayers, <S%G4335><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may stand <S%G2476><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> complete <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I bear him record, <S%G3140><s%> <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he hath <S%G2192><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> zeal <S%G2205><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that are in <S%G1722><s%> Laodicea, <S%G2993><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Hierapolis. <S%G2404><s%>
Luke, <S%G3065><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> physician, <S%G2395><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Demas, <S%G1214><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> which are in <S%G1722><s%> Laodicea, <S%G2993><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Nymphas, <S%G3564><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> which is in <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> this epistle <S%G1992><s%> is read <S%G314><s%> among <S%G3844><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> cause <S%G4160><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> it be read <S%G314><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> of the Laodiceans; <S%G2994><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that ye <S%G5210><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> read <S%G314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> epistle from <S%G1537><s%> Laodicea. <S%G2993><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> to Archippus, <S%G751><s%> Take heed <S%G991><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> ministry <S%G1248><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast received <S%G3880><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> thou fulfill <S%G4137><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> salutation <S%G783><s%> by the hand <S%G5495><s%> of me <S%G1699><s%> Paul. <S%G3972><s%> Remember <S%G3421><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> bonds. <S%G1199><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
